projects.name: PI Vendor Intelligence System
projects.description: AI-powered vendor matching platform for PI attorneys. Multi-source scraping (Reddit 14 subreddits, LinkedIn, review sites). GPT-4o-mini extraction, weighted matching algorithm.
projects.clientAcquisitionRelevance: HIGH - Core MVA lead gen tool. SCOUT bot provides real-time intel. Positions Kurios as authority.

projects.name: Vendor Database
projects.description: Earlier/simpler version of vendor intelligence. Superseded by pi-vendors.

projects.name: Vendors Kurios Brand Site
projects.description: Authority SEO website for PI vendor matching. React/Vite/Tailwind SPA. Quiz/matcher tool for lead capture.

targetKeywords: best personal injury lead generation companies

projects.clientAcquisitionRelevance: MEDIUM-HIGH - Frontend for vendor matching. Quiz captures PI attorney leads.

relationships.integration: pi-vendors provides data/intelligence, vendors-kuriosbrand displays it

overallMVARelevance: These form a cohesive MVA client acquisition funnel. pi-vendors collects intelligence, SCOUT bot provides queries, vendors-kuriosbrand (when deployed) captures leads via SEO and quiz.
